languages.text: {n}Торбальд багровеет, но не находится с ответом. Оптикон-22 покаянно опускает голову и изрекает бинарную трель. Ни один из них не находит дерзких слов для отповеди вам.{/n}

{n}Thorbald's face turns purple, but he cannot come up with a retort. Opticon-22 lowers his head repentantly and lets out a binharic trill. Neither of them can find the words to rebuff your pointed accusation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Торбальд багровеет, но не находится с ответом. Оптикон-22 покаянно опускает голову и изрекает бинарную трель. Ни один из них не находит дерзких слов для отповеди вам.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索巴德涨红了脸，却无法反驳什么。奥普蒂孔22号懊恼地低下了头，发出了二进制语的颤音。他们两人都无法反驳你尖锐的指责。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face turns purple, but he cannot come up with a retort. Opticon-22 lowers his head repentantly and lets out a binharic trill. Neither of them can find the words to rebuff your pointed accusation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德涨红了脸，却无法反驳什么。奥普蒂孔22号懊恼地低下了头，发出了二进制语的颤音。他们两人都无法反驳你尖锐的指责。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Thorbald s'empourpre, mais ne trouve rien de pertinent à répondre. Opticon-22 baisse la tête d'un air penaud en laissant échapper un trille binhaire. Aucun des deux ne trouve les mots qu'il faudrait pour réfuter votre accusation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face turns purple, but he cannot come up with a retort. Opticon-22 lowers his head repentantly and lets out a binharic trill. Neither of them can find the words to rebuff your pointed accusation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald s'empourpre, mais ne trouve rien de pertinent à répondre. Opticon-22 baisse la tête d'un air penaud en laissant échapper un trille binhaire. Aucun des deux ne trouve les mots qu'il faudrait pour réfuter votre accusation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}トールバルドの顔は怒りに染まったが、反論を思いつかなかったようだ。オプティコン-22は悔しそうに頭を下げ、バイナリックの機械音を発した。ふたりともこちらの鋭い非難に反論する言葉が見つからないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face turns purple, but he cannot come up with a retort. Opticon-22 lowers his head repentantly and lets out a binharic trill. Neither of them can find the words to rebuff your pointed accusation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}トールバルドの顔は怒りに染まったが、反論を思いつかなかったようだ。オプティコン-22は悔しそうに頭を下げ、バイナリックの機械音を発した。ふたりともこちらの鋭い非難に反論する言葉が見つからないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A Thorbald se le pone la cara morada, pero no se le ocurre ninguna réplica. Opticon-22 agacha la cabeza arrepentido y deja escapar un trino binario. Ninguno de los dos encuentra las palabras para rebatir tu punzante acusación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face turns purple, but he cannot come up with a retort. Opticon-22 lowers his head repentantly and lets out a binharic trill. Neither of them can find the words to rebuff your pointed accusation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A Thorbald se le pone la cara morada, pero no se le ocurre ninguna réplica. Opticon-22 agacha la cabeza arrepentido y deja escapar un trino binario. Ninguno de los dos encuentra las palabras para rebatir tu punzante acusación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Thorbalds Gesicht färbt sich violett, doch ihm fällt keine Erwiderung ein. Opticon-22 senkt reuig den Kopf und stößt einen binhären Triller aus. Keiner von ihnen findet die Worte, um etwas auf deinen scharfen Vorwurf zu erwidern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face turns purple, but he cannot come up with a retort. Opticon-22 lowers his head repentantly and lets out a binharic trill. Neither of them can find the words to rebuff your pointed accusation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbalds Gesicht färbt sich violett, doch ihm fällt keine Erwiderung ein. Opticon-22 senkt reuig den Kopf und stößt einen binhären Triller aus. Keiner von finden findet die Worte, um etwas auf deinen scharfen Vorwurf zu erwidern.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yüzü mosmor kesilen Thorbald, cevap veremiyor. Opticon-22 de tövbekâr biçimde başını eğip ikilidilde bir ses çıkarıyor. İthamın karşısında ikisi de dilini yutmuş gibi kalakalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face turns purple, but he cannot come up with a retort. Opticon-22 lowers his head repentantly and lets out a binharic trill. Neither of them can find the words to rebuff your pointed accusation.{/n}
